html: (7/7) I voted no today on the rules package because the people of Missouri deserve fairness and this rules package neither embodies that, nor does it make life better for my constituents.
text: (7/7) I voted no today on the rules package because the people of Missouri deserve fairness and this rules package neither embodies that, nor does it make life better for my constituents.

html: (6/7) This package also eliminates commonsense pro-life provisions that have long held broad support and protect the life of the unborn.
text: (6/7) This package also eliminates commonsense pro-life provisions that have long held broad support and protect the life of the unborn.

html: (5/7) It shouldn’t be easy to take more of your hard earned money and send it to Washington – it should be harder. 2nd District families are burdened enough by taxes, and the last thing Congress should be doing is making it easier to increase your taxes.
text: (5/7) It shouldn’t be easy to take more of your hard earned money and send it to Washington – it should be harder. 2nd District families are burdened enough by taxes, and the last thing Congress should be doing is making it easier to increase your taxes.

html: (4/7) One of the biggest partisan power grabs gives the Democratic majority the power to raise your taxes with only a simple majority, instead of the supermajority that was in place last Congress.
text: (4/7) One of the biggest partisan power grabs gives the Democratic majority the power to raise your taxes with only a simple majority, instead of the supermajority that was in place last Congress.

html: (3/7) That is why I am disappointed that Democrats decided to forgo bipartisanship on their first day in power when they forced through changes to the rules of the House of Representatives that will make life more difficult for our community.
text: (3/7) That is why I am disappointed that Democrats decided to forgo bipartisanship on their first day in power when they forced through changes to the rules of the House of Representatives that will make life more difficult for our community.

html: (2/7) Whether it is my work to end human trafficking, supporting our veterans, or cutting the red tape that holds back American ingenuity, the needs of #MO2 come first.
text: (2/7) Whether it is my work to end human trafficking, supporting our veterans, or cutting the red tape that holds back American ingenuity, the needs of #MO2 come first.

html: (1/7) I am honored and privileged to work for you in Congress, and do my best to support bipartisan solutions to our nation’s most urgent problems.
text: (1/7) I am honored and privileged to work for you in Congress, and do my best to support bipartisan solutions to our nation’s most urgent problems.

html: I had the honor and privilege of knowing and working for President Bush for a number of years, starting in 1992 as the Executive Director for the Bush/Quayle campaign in Missouri. He was a humble and dignified leader who put his faith, family, and country above himself. (2/3)
text:
I had the honor and privilege of knowing and working for President Bush for a number of years, starting in 1992 as the Executive Director for the Bush/Quayle campaign in Missouri.

html: Our legislation will expand freedom and flexibility, and make parenthood more affordable. These irreplaceable weeks, the relationships and peace of mind of our moms, dads, and children—these are the things worth fighting for.
text: Our legislation will expand freedom and flexibility, and make parenthood more affordable. These irreplaceable weeks, the relationships and peace of mind of our moms, dads, and children—these are the things worth fighting for.

html: Research shows that women who have paid leave are more likely to return to work after having a child. Families shouldn’t have to choose between financial stability and the well-being of their children.
text: Research shows that women who have paid leave are more likely to return to work after having a child. Families shouldn’t have to choose between financial stability and the well-being of their children.

html: We are the only industrialized country in the world that does not offer access to paid maternity leave. Without access to paid leave, parents face lower labor force participation and reduced lifetime earnings, despite needing a steady income then more than ever.
text: We are the only industrialized country in the world that does not offer access to paid maternity leave. Without access to paid leave, parents face lower labor force participation and reduced lifetime earnings, despite needing a steady income then more than ever.

html: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act is pro-family tax reform that expands the Child Tax Credit, doubles the standard deduction, lowers individual rates, and preserves the adoption tax credit and retirement savings options I fought hard to keep.
text: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act is pro-family tax reform that expands the Child Tax Credit, doubles the standard deduction, lowers individual rates, and preserves the adoption tax credit and retirement savings options I fought hard to keep.
